About

This blog is for:

  • Documenting stupid shit I do and lessons learned to prevent myself from making the same mistakes twice
  • Keeping friends and family sort of updated on my whereabouts
  • Reference material should anybody want to try something similar in the future
  • Enlightening the world with my epic writing skills

I'm writing in English because:

  • The 3rd reason above
  • I like English
  • My Dutch vocabulary is abysmal, whereas my knowledge of the English vocabulary is massive enough to know words such as "abysmal".

Enjoy!
